Game of Thrones Ascent017561bysax0n25so5vxjexu10pvm5fbgctuc1279162014-04-18T22:50:49ZTargaryenBlood5239707[[File:Game_of_Thrones_Ascent.jpg|link=w:c:gotascent]]

'''Game of Thrones Ascent''' is a social network game based on the HBO television series. The game is developed with [http://www.disruptorbeam.com/ Disruptor Beam] in association with '''HBO'''. Each time a new episode is aired, new content for the game is released that is based on that episode.

Create a Lord or Lady and swear fealty to one of the Great Houses: [[w:c:gotascent/House Baratheon|Baratheon]], [[w:c:gotascent/House Greyjoy|Greyjoy]], [[w:c:gotascent/House Lannister|Lannister]], [[w:c:gotascent/House Stark|Stark]] or [[w:c:gotascent/House Targaryen|Targaryen]].

Discover the stories within the game that have been created in consultation with the Producers of the HBO television series, except that your character will be part of the grand story that unfolds.

Who will you ally with? What does your character value?

:: Do they put their family's interests first or those of the Realm?<br />Is your character cunning or truthful?<br />Do they support the Old Gods or the New?

[[File:Game_of_Thrones_Ascent_Wiki_Facebook_Logo.jpg|right|200px]]

It's all up to you!

Activate the game on Facebook so that you can play with all your friends, and then play the game on which ever platform suits you;Â [http://apps.facebook.com/gamethrones Facebook],Â [http://www.kongregate.com/games/DisruptorBeam/game-of-thrones-ascent Kongregate]Â or directly withÂ [http://gota-www.disruptorbeam.com/ Disruptor Beam].

â€‹For more information about the game, check out the [[w:c:gotascent|Game of Thrones Ascent Wiki]].
